text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The fan noise is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ROG Strix Scar III  G531GV-DB76 15.6" 240 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 1 TB PCIe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2060 in the ASUS ROG Strix Scar III  G531GV-DB76 15.6" 240 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 1 TB PCIe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The port selection is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ROG Strix Scar III  G531GV-DB76 15.6" 240 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 1 TB PCIe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2060 in the ASUS ROG Strix Scar III  G531GV-DB76 15.6" 240 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 1 TB PCIe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

The ASUS ROG Strix Scar III  G531GV-DB76 15.6" 240 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 1 TB PCIe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for streaming games, but the trackpad could be better. Had a minor issue with driver updates being a bit tricky, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.
